title: Can't login to game?
body:
I've been trying to login for about a hour it is saying username & password combination not recognised but when I come to the site I can login fine with my details I have sent a ticket to the support but have heard nothing back yet.

Can anyone on here help me it makes no sense to me how I can login here and but not the game it's self.

replies.body:
Since you've already submitted a support ticket, I recommend waiting for a specialist to get back to you about this. 

Let me know if you have any other questions.
